data.app_name: World War Toons: Tank Arena VR
data.description:
World War Toons: Tank Arena VR is a multiplayer virtual reality game that puts players behind the controls of a tank and into the heat of battle. This game offers an immersive experience with intuitive controls, engaging and fun graphics.
Players can choose from a variety of tanks, each with its own unique abilities and weapons.  In addition to its multiplayer modes, World War Toons: Tank Arena VR also offers a PvP 4 vs 4 multiplayer mode alongside battle against AI’s where players can improve their skills and learn the ropes of tank combat.
With fast-paced battles against other tankers, World War Toons: Tank Arena VR offers an exciting gameplay experience. So, gather your friends, choose your tank, and get ready to enter the battlefield!

[KEY FEATURES]
•	Hands-on controller gameplay
•	Strategic 4 vs 4 deathmatch
•	Multiplayer mode
•	VoIP, Group matching
•	Global leaderboard for MVP
•	Experience various battlefields
•	Collect tanks skins, accessories from your loot-box and customize your own tanks

changelog.change_log:
[Tutorial]
We've revamped our tutorial to make it super easy to start and finish. 
As soon as the game starts, you will get a pop-up message giving you the option to play the tutorial to help learn the basics of gameplay or if you’ve already played and want to skip tutorial, you can do so too. 
In the updated tutorial, you will learn how to move the tank, reload your weapon and use the special skill so our Commanders can learn to play the game in an intuitive and fun way. 
If you skipped tutorial for some reason and played the game only to learn that you need help, don’t worry, you will be able to re-do the tutorial because the tutorial button can be accessible anytime in the lobby table.

[Lootbox]
Previously when our Commanders opened their Lootbox (Rewards when leveling up), there was no info about them and many had wondered where to apply their new skins, accessories and decal. But in this update, we have included information about the rewards you get and which tanks these items apply to.  
Please make sure to update the game so you can be all caught up. Besides that, we hope you continue to enjoy World War Toons: Tank Arena and Keep your eyes peeled for more thrilling action and stay tuned for all the latest from our incredible community!
